page.title: 08THE BOLNEY BAKERY
page.content: { Mr.Smith}became a{baker}when he left school.He lived in{Devon}and worked in a{bakery}there.His training took four years.He bought The Bakery in{Bolney} in{May 1975.}It is about{100 yrs old. He works{18}hours a day.He gets up at {12.30}in the morning.He makes lots of cakes and loaves a day.He uses a ton of flour a week.He uses{english}flour for cakes and biscuits,but he uses {canadian}or{austrian}flour for bread. Mr.Smith said that white bread is more popular than brown bread.The day we went he had already made{1700}rolls. He had a big oven which held 200 loaves .He doesn't use it any more.His new oven can bake{60}loaves at one time.He uses it at 500F. He pays Â£100 a month for electricity. He makes{wedding}cakes and{birthday cakes and has a helper who decorates them.He has a delivery van too.
